summary: The hard drinking grandson of a legendary labor leader gets arrested for drunk driving. He decides to run for Governor against the corrupt prosecuting attorney.
cast: William Tanoos|Paul Fleschner|Tom Sizemore|Jesse Ventura|Ken Barnard|Steve Bayorgeon|Anthony Pierre Christopher|Cindy Gold|Jesse Bob Harper|Elaine Ivy Harris|Antoine McKay|Deanna Myers|Michael Pogue|Sara Sevigny|Kevin Stark|Gabriella Tanoos|Kristie Berger|Robert Breuler|Alison Chemers|Richard Cotovsky|Adria Dawn|Minita Gandhi|Meirika Girten|Danny Goldring|Jim Goss|Ian Griffiths|Steve Herson|Tom Hickey|Eddie Huchro|Tommy Lee Johnston|Maura Kidwell|Sean Leonard|Andy Luther|Mike McNamara|Adam Mondschein|Nancy M. Nasser|Josh Odor|Tim Paul|Adam Poss|Ken Prymus|Gail Rastorfer|Robyn LeAnn Scott|Bear Sheeley|Suzanne Sole|Bradley M. Spencer|Tony Tanoos|John Thompson|John Turk|Tommie Turner|Elias Valles|Tuckie White|Jacob M Williams|Michael B. Woods|Jordan Campbell
title: The Drunk
